metadata.title: CVE-2024-53149 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: typec: ucsi: glink: fix off-by-one in connector_statusUCSI connector's indices start from 1 up to 3, PMIC_GLINK_MAX_PORTS.Correct the condition in the pmic_glink_ucsi_connector_status()callback, fixing Type-C orientation reporting for the third USB-Cconnector.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-17.17').
linux-aws package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-1009.10').
